attributes.additional_details:
with politions promising the electorate all sorts to get elected and once elected breaking that promise then that should be considered fraud and a re-election instigated.
for example
david cameron promised the electorate a referendum on the EU but once elected stated that the electorate would not receive a vote on this subject.

This is fraud , by promising the electorate a vote  to get elected but once elected withdrawing the promise.

Politicians should conceed that they are elected by the people to run the country in the best interests of the people and should reflect what the people want , over the years we have seen politicians totally disregard public opinion in favour of there own personal views and no the views of there electorate
